channel.title: Shop help? [317 Delta]
channel.description:
It appears that I do not have the Wanneshop Zeke Lowe, ect. So im asking if anyone can add these to my client.java and send it to me, it would be most appreciated
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?w8fa24g3fy66h4m]http://www.mediafire.com/?w8fa24g3fy66h4m[/url] That is the source. Just please fix the Wanneshops so I can add shops to my Server If you could find a Delta clean server with the Wanneshops and identical to this one, that would be perfect.

item.title: Shop help? [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Heyboyscape Heyboyscape
item.description:
@Heyboyscape wrote:

Insert Quote Alright, I guess you don't have those...

Add this under case 155:

Code (Java): [Select]
boolean PutNPCCoords = false;

And add this somewhere in client.java:

Code (Java): [Select]
//check shopping
if (WanneShop > 0) {
if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) {
openUpShop(WanneShop);
WanneShop = 0;
}
}

Add this in your public ints:

Code (Java): [Select]
public int WanneShop = 0;

THANK YOU! Actually the only thing that was missing from my client.java in order for shops to work was the public int THANK YOU!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help? [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Zhawa Zhawa
item.description:
@Zhawa wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:2, topic:374725”] if(NPCID == 633) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; }

Goes in client.java.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help? [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Alright, I guess you don’t have those…

Add this under case 155:

boolean PutNPCCoords = false;

And add this somewhere in client.java:

//check shopping
		if (WanneShop > 0) {
			if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) {
				openUpShop(WanneShop);
				WanneShop = 0;
			}
		}

Add this in your public ints:

public int WanneShop = 0;

Read full topic
